languages.text: Кости героя, обрушившегося на поселение богомерзких ксеносов, наполняют таранные конструкции корабля неукротимой яростью.
The ship's ramming prow is filled with indomitable fury from the bones of a martyr who fell upon a settlement of abominable xenos.
languages.original_text: Кости героя, обрушившегося на поселение богомерзких ксеносов, наполняют таранные конструкции корабля неукротимой яростью.

traits.locale_text: The bones of a martyr who brought down a settlement of abominable xenos fill the ramming structures of the ship with indomitable fury.
The bones of a martyr who brought down a settlement of abominable xenos fill the ramming structures of the ship with indomitable fury.
The ship's ramming prow is filled with indomitable fury from the bones of a martyr who fell upon a settlement of abominable xenos.
The ship's ramming prow is filled with indomitable fury from the bones of a martyr who fell upon a settlement of abominable xenos.
The ship's ramming prow is filled with indomitable fury from the bones of a martyr who fell upon a settlement of abominable xenos.
The ship's ramming prow is filled with indomitable fury from the bones of a martyr who fell upon a settlement of abominable xenos.

languages.text: Der Rammbug des Schiffes ist vom unbezähmbaren Zorn der Knochen eines Märtyrers erfüllt, der in einer Ansiedlung abscheulicher Xenos den Tod fand.
languages.original_text: The ship's ramming prow is filled with indomitable fury from the bones of a martyr who fell upon a settlement of abominable xenos.

traits.locale_text: Der Rammbug des Schiffes ist vom unbezähmbaren Zorn der Knochen eines Märtyrers erfüllt, der in einer Ansiedlung abscheulicher Xenos den Tod fand.

languages.text: La proue à éperon du vaisseau est empreinte de la fureur indomptable émanant des ossements d'un martyr tombé par hasard sur une colonie d'abominables xénos.
languages.original_text: The ship's ramming prow is filled with indomitable fury from the bones of a martyr who fell upon a settlement of abominable xenos.

traits.locale_text: La proue à éperon du vaisseau est empreinte de la fureur indomptable émanant des ossements d'un martyr tombé par hasard sur une colonie d'abominables xénos.

languages.text: La proa ariete de la nave está llena de la furia indomable de los huesos de un mártir que cayó ante un asentamiento de aborrecibles xenos.
languages.original_text: The ship's ramming prow is filled with indomitable fury from the bones of a martyr who fell upon a settlement of abominable xenos.

traits.locale_text: La proa ariete de la nave está llena de la furia indomable de los huesos de un mártir que cayó ante un asentamiento de aborrecibles xenos.

languages.text: 船の舳先は、忌まわしき異種族の集落で倒れた殉教者の骨による不屈の怒りで満たされている。
languages.original_text: The ship's ramming prow is filled with indomitable fury from the bones of a martyr who fell upon a settlement of abominable xenos.

traits.locale_text: 船の舳先は、忌まわしき異種族の集落で倒れた殉教者の骨による不屈の怒りで満たされている。

languages.text: 这艘船的撞角包含着某位殉道者的遗骨，充斥着不屈不挠的怒火。那位殉道者倒在了邪恶异形的定居点中。
languages.original_text: The ship's ramming prow is filled with indomitable fury from the bones of a martyr who fell upon a settlement of abominable xenos.

traits.locale_text: 这艘船的撞角包含着某位殉道者的遗骨，充斥着不屈不挠的怒火。那位殉道者倒在了邪恶异形的定居点中。

languages.text: Deminin koçbaşı pruvası, zeno ucubelerin bir yerleşim yerine saldırmış bir şehidin sönmez bir hiddetle dolup taşan kemiklerini ihtiva ediyor.
languages.original_text: The ship's ramming prow is filled with indomitable fury from the bones of a martyr who fell upon a settlement of abominable xenos.
